"A.P.238/4/5":
"Ah, <%me>.
...Sorry, I spaced out for a bit there."

"Did you see that message just now? It said
they were holding a large scale event for
ARKS. You're going to participate, aren't you?"

"I'm...Well, I'm not
really ready to be in that kind of mood."

"Hehe, if Zeno were here though, he'd say,
"I'd participate in a split second!"
If only he would come back soon."

"...Ah, sorry.
I didn't mean to get all sad on you.
Don't worry about it. See you later."

"さっきの連絡、見た？
アークスの大々的な催し物だってね。
きみも参加するんでしょ？"

"あたしは……あたしはちょっと
まだそういう気分にはなれないかな。"

"ふふっ、ゼノがいたら一も二もなく
参加する！　って言い出すだろうな。
早く戻ってくればいいのに。"

"……あ、ごめん。
しんみりさせるつもりはなかったの。
気にしないで。それじゃあね。"
